vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Σεμεείν (Rec. Σεμεΐ), ὁ, indecl.,
Semein: Luk.3:26.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.26;
son of: Josech (G2501K);
father of: Mattathias (G3161H)
§ Semein, "Yahweh has heard"
Semei, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:26*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西美 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "傾聽者:我的報告"
瑪他提亞的父親,耶穌基督的家譜 (路 3:26)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
西美 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "倾听者:我的报告"
玛他提亚的父亲,耶稣基督的家谱 (路 3:26)
